titlestmt.titleproper: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports 1958-1968
University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports

profiledesc.creation: Inventory encoded in Oxygen XML editor by Steven Burg. March 25, 2016

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports 1958-1968

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Agricultural Extension Service.

did.abstract: Bound typescript and printed reports of county agricultural agents, home demonstration agents, and 4-H clubs; also include photographs, clippings, charts, and examples of publications, 1958 to 1968.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports (AZ 304). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cooperative project of the University of Arizona, College of Agriculture and the U.S. Dept. of Agriculture to encourage agriculture and home economics in Arizona.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized chronologically by county within fiscal year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Bound typescript and printed reports of county agricultural agents, home demonstration agents, and 4-H clubs; also include photographs, clippings, charts, and examples of publications, 1958 to 1968.

relatedmaterial.p: Related collections at AZ 298, AZ 301 through AZ 303, AZ 305 through AZ 309.
Reports for earlier years found at AZ 301, 302, and 303.
Continued by AZ 304 University of Arizona, Agricultural Extension Service, Combined reports of the county, home, and 4-H club agents, 1958-1968.
